Articles.Content:
You have to make ship that can land at least one kerbal to eve and get him back to kerbin.

Weight and number of parts isn't important.

Stock only and no cheating!

Also try to include wheels because getting back will be easier when you drive your kerbal on the highest mountain.

When done, give us some screenshots and craft file of the ship.

Good luck!

Edited May 1, 2014 by Cannon

umm.... there's quite plenty of pro players who did this already......

they just dont post their journeys in the challenge sub-forum

Challenge needs more explicit rules (Mods allowed? What is considered cheating?) and some sort of scoring system to rank entries.

Otherwise it's just a "Share your Eve return mission" thread, which is not bad in and of itself but it is not a challenge thread.
This isn't that challenging, if you were looking for ideas though, you can see my mission log to get a pretty good idea of what you need.
